title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education        The George Washington Memorial Parkway makes a great classroom! With so many sites and such diverse human and natural history, you are guaranteed to find a place in the park near you with landforms, wildlife, or historic resources that will bring your curriculum to life. Plan a Field Trip Curriculum Materials   Â    Please visit the Arlington House, Clara Barton National Historic Site, Claude Moore Colonial Farm, Glen Echo Park, Great Falls Park, Lyndon Baines Johnson Memorial, and Theodore Roosevelt Island webpages for information about field trips to those sites.
